tasks.task: Farming Operations at Grass Patch Property near Esperance
subtasks: Discussing harvest timing and crop rotation
Mention of increasing grower interest in lentils
Highlighting the development of the lentil industry in WA, especially in Esperance port zone
Describing GRDC research support into lentil agronomy and varieties
Discussing new varieties like Hallmark and Highlands with better herbicide options and lower shatter rates
Highlighting innovation in sowing lentils early in mid-April for better growth
Discussing paddock preparation methods for lentil cultivation
Explaining modern header technology improvements for lentil harvesting
Addressing measures to prevent lentil cracking during hot weather
Noting recommendations for minimizing fire risks from lentil residue
Mentioning storage practices, such as using sheds and tarps
Providing farmer testimonials and encouragement for other growers
